scripts.build: react-scripts build && cp -R config/.well-known build && cp _* build
scripts.deploy: REACT_APP_ETHEREUM_HOST='wss://ethereum-websocket-api.herokuapp.com:80/' npm run build && cp -R config/.well-known build && surge -d stellereum.com build
scripts.deploy:test: REACT_APP_CONTRACT_ADDRESS=0xc05b7a1c47123c840e0a71e33d464e34c1220181 REACT_APP_ETHEREUM_HOST='wss://ethereum-testnet-websocket-api.herokuapp.com:80/' npm run build && surge -d testnet.stellereum.com build
